faq.title: Questions? We've got answers.
faq.subtitle: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us.

items.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime in your account settings. Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period.

items.question: Can I change my plan?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will take effect at your next billing cycle.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes, new users get 1 month free when they sign up for Premium. Cancel anytime during the trial period.

items.question: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and various local payment methods depending on your region.

alreadySubscribed.modalMessage: You already have an active subscription. Please manage your subscription in your account settings.
